TRADFRI_CONNECT_DESC: Connect to the Tradfri Gateway with the Security Code printed on the back of the Gateway.
TRADFRI_SECURITY_CODE_DOC: The Security Code printed on the back of the Tradfri Gateway.
TRADFRI_SETTINGS_DESC: The settings for the Tradfri plugin
TRADFRI_DEVICE_GROUP_DOC: The name of a Tradfri Device (power outlet, light bulb etc.) or a Tradfri Group which should be controlled based on the playback state.
TRADFRI_SWITCH_OFF_DELAY_DOC: The number of seconds to wait before switching off the Tradfri Device(s) after the playback has stopped.
